rows.heading: Go
rows.description: These foods give us energy to help us "go" and be active.
rows.audio_transcript: Our bodies convert foods such as potatoes, rice, cassava into energy. Our muscles need this energy for normal daily activities like walking and running, as well as other physical activities. Go foods are the most important source of energy for our bodies.

rows.heading: Grow
rows.description: These are proteins-rich foods that support growth: they help build and repair our bodies.
rows.examples: Beans, Lentils, Eggs, Milk, Chicken, Fish
rows.audio_transcript: Grow foods like milk, beans, fish, meat and eggs support growth.They provide the body with nutrients, which are necessary for the development of organs and bone tissue.

rows.heading: Glow
rows.description: "Glow" foods improve our health and protect our bodies from getting diseases.
rows.examples: Spinach, Kale, Watermelon, Orange, Pawpaw; Lettuce; Pumpkin
rows.audio_transcript: Glow foods are fruit, like mangoes or oranges, and vegetables, like kale or spinach. They help keep our bodies healthy by providing some nutrients which help to boost our immunity. Other examples of glow foods include watermelon, avocado and pumpkin.
